actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the investment tax credit and the accelerated cost recovery system to certain property used in Puerto Rico or other possessions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the investment tax credit and the accelerated cost recovery system to certain property used in Puerto Rico or other possessions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the investment tax credit and the accelerated cost recovery system to certain property used in Puerto Rico or other possessions.
